title: Towel, late 19th–early 20th century
medium:
Medium: linen, cotton
Technique: jacquard woven. Field: 8-harness satin damask; Borders: supplementary blue cotton weft in the warp, float face of the 8-harness satin bound on the surface as weft face 8-harness satin. The supplementary wefts floated free
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 106 x 55 cm (41 3/4 x 21 5/8 in.)
description: Rectangular white damask towel with figural cartouche in center surrounded by detached flowers and blue border with late 16th century style dragons facing an urn.

tombstone.epitaph:
Towel, late 19th–early 20th century. Medium: linen, cotton
Technique: jacquard woven. Field: 8-harness satin damask; Borders: supplementary blue cotton weft in the warp, float face of the 8-harness satin bound on the surface as weft face 8-harness satin. The supplementary wefts floated free . 1974-62-1.
